name: Chibber's Day Out
description:
A quick arcade-style game by Surprise! Crabs? Help Chibber get as big as possible by eating everything around him! Completed in less than 48 hours for Shanty Jam L4 university game jam. Theme: Big Chonky Birds

Controls:

WASD to move your bird around

Space to fly upwards

GET CHONKY!

Contact:

Surprise! Crabs? is Austin Vickers, Charles Grady, Gil Grady, and Spencer Bowen

Send all questions and comments directly to the development team at:

surprisecrabsdevelopers@gmail.com

We love to hear feedback via email, or directly through itch.io!
